alert.note: Alert for Edmunds; Faulk; Hyde; McPherson (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued April 03 at 12:47PM MDT until April 06 at 3:00AM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM TUESDAY TO 4 AM CDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions expected. Total snow accumulations of 12 to 18 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze. Winds gusting as high as 65 mph. * WHERE...McPherson, Edmunds, Faulk and Hyde Counties. * WHEN...From 7 AM Tuesday to 4 AM CDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Strong winds could cause extensive damage to trees and power lines. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strongest winds will begin later than when snow starts and continue after the snow ends.
info.instruction: Travel should be restricted to emergencies only. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you. If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
